00010 #ifndef SNOWMAN_ASQG_H
00011 #define SNOWMAN_ASQG_H
00012 
00013 #include "SQG.h"
00014 #include "Match.h"
00015 
00016 namespace SnowmanASQG
00017 {
00018     enum RecordType
00019     {
00020         RT_HEADER = 0,
00021         RT_VERTEX,
00022         RT_EDGE
00023     };
00024 
00025     // A header record is just a tag:value pairs
00026     struct HeaderRecord
00027     {
00028         public:
00029             HeaderRecord();
00030             HeaderRecord(const std::string& recordLine);
00031             
00032             void setOverlapTag(int overlapLen);
00033             void setInputFileTag(const std::string& name);
00034             void setErrorRateTag(float errorRate);
00035             void setContainmentTag(int v);
00036             void setTransitiveTag(int v);
00037 
00038             const SQG::IntTag& getVersionTag() const { return m_versionTag; }
00039             const SQG::FloatTag& getErrorRateTag() const { return m_errorRateTag; }
00040             const SQG::StringTag& getInfileTag() const { return m_infileTag; }
00041             const SQG::IntTag& getOverlapTag() const { return m_overlapTag; }
00042             const SQG::IntTag& getContainmentTag() const { return m_containmentTag; };
00043             const SQG::IntTag& getTransitiveTag() const { return m_transitiveTag; };
00044 
00045             void write(std::ostream& out);
00046             void write(std::stringstream& out); // JEREMIAH
00047             void parse(const std::string& record);
00048 
00049         private:
00050 
00051             void setVersionTag(int version);
00052             
00053             SQG::IntTag m_versionTag;
00054             SQG::FloatTag m_errorRateTag;
00055             SQG::StringTag m_infileTag;
00056             SQG::IntTag m_overlapTag;
00057             SQG::IntTag m_containmentTag;
00058             SQG::IntTag m_transitiveTag;
00059     };
00060 
00061     // A vertex record is an id, sequence and an array of
00062     // tag:value 
00063     struct VertexRecord
00064     {
00065         public:
00066             VertexRecord() {}
00067             VertexRecord(const std::string& recordLine);
00068             VertexRecord(const std::string& i, const std::string& s) : m_id(i), m_seq(s) {}
00069 
00070             void setSubstringTag(bool b);
00071             
00072             const std::string& getID() const { return m_id; }
00073             const std::string& getSeq() const { return m_seq; }
00074             const SQG::IntTag& getSubstringTag() const { return m_substringTag; }
00075 
00076             void write(std::ostream& out);
00077             void write(std::stringstream& out);
00078             void parse(const std::string& record);
00079 
00080         private:
00081 
00082             std::string m_id;
00083             std::string m_seq;
00084             SQG::IntTag m_substringTag;
00085     };
00086 
00087     // An edge record is just an overlap object and tag:values
00088     struct EdgeRecord
00089     {
00090         public:
00091             EdgeRecord() {}
00092             EdgeRecord(const std::string& recordLine);
00093             EdgeRecord(const Overlap& o) : m_overlap(o) {}
00094 
00095             const Overlap& getOverlap() const { return m_overlap; }
00096 
00097             void write(std::ostream& out);
00098             void parse(const std::string& record);
00099 
00100         private:
00101         
00102             Overlap m_overlap;
00103     };
00104 
00105     // Parsing functions
00106     RecordType getRecordType(const std::string& record);
00107     HeaderRecord parseHeaderRecord(const std::string& record);
00108     VertexRecord parseVertexRecord(const std::string& record);
00109     EdgeRecord parseEdgeRecord(const std::string& record);
00110 
00111     // Writing functions
00112     void writeFields(std::ostream& out, const StringVector& fields);
00113 };
